request.description:
Get Role

This endpoint use for get roles. When call it, if success it will return:

[ { "Name": "Administrator", "NormalizedName": "ADMINISTRATOR" }, { "Name": "QA", "NormalizedName": "QA" }, { "Name": "RD", "NormalizedName": "RD" }, { "Name": "PM", "NormalizedName": "PM" } ]

Otherwise it return error

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

request.description:
Get All users

This endpoint use for get all user. When call it, if success it will return:

[ { "Email": "admin@ticket.com", "UserName": "admin@ticket.com", "RoleNames": [ "Administrator" ] }, { "Email": "qauser@ticket.com", "UserName": "qauser@ticket.com", "RoleNames": [ "QA" ] }, { "Email": "rduser@ticket.com", "UserName": "rduser@ticket.com", "RoleNames": [ "RD" ] }, { "Email": "pmuser@ticket.com", "UserName": "pmuser@ticket.com", "RoleNames": [ "PM" ] }, { "Email": "example@example.com", "UserName": "example@example.com", "RoleNames": [ "SP" ] } ]

Otherwise it return error

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

request.description:
Create Role

This endpoint for create new role. When call it, if success it will return:

{ "StatusCode": 200, "Message": "PM is Created sussessfully", "Token": "", "UserName": null, "Role": "" }

Otherwise it return error

request.description:

Otherwise it return error

request.description:

This endpoint use for activate user or assign role to user. When call it, it will return:

Otherwise it return error

request.description:
Get Bug Ticket by Id

This endpoint use for get specific Bug Ticket. When call it, it will response:

{ "Id": "173a1d1e-4fa8-4274-8f8d-9e060cacaead", "Description": "Bug Description", "Summary": "Bug Summary", "Severity": false, "Priority": true, "TicketType": 0 }

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

request.description:
Update Bug Ticket

This endpoint use for update Bug Ticket. When call it, it will response:

{ "message": "Update Success!", "Ticket": { "Id": "173a1d1e-4fa8-4274-8f8d-9e060cacaead", "Description": "Bug Description Update", "Summary": "Bug Summary", "Severity": false, "Priority": true, "TicketType": 0 } }

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

body.raw:
{
  "Description": "nisi anim",
  "Summary": "aute ut esse quis nulla",
  "TicketType": 3,
  "Id": "urn:uuid:b15219ea-fa79-f12a-a0fa-c45d7baf7bab",
  "Severity": false,
  "Priority": true
}

This endpoint use for resolve Bug Ticket to Resolve. When call it, if success it will response:

If record not found it will response with:

Otherwise it return error
